default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: Eastside Firefighting Ambassador Flora reporting for duty! Wherever I am, not a single spark will appear! Really!

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: This makes putting out fires a lot easier. You can look forward to my performance, Chief.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: If only I had this power before the big fire... but now, I can do more!

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Keep up! Don't fall behind!

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Preparing to return. Currently at the handover scene.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: The fire is out of control.

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Spray with the hose!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: There are still people who are... who are...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Good morning, Chief. Remember to check the fire equipment regularly. Safety first!

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: I don't like to use the firefighter's ax... I always hurt my teammates by accident.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: My ex-coworkers always act weird around me. Am I being ostracized?

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: Give me anything with a hose and I can put out a fire! Hehe... it's just a matter of precision.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: Sorry, I don't hate people who use flames as weapons, but... forget it. I will definitely keep an eye on them. After all, the best cure is prevention!

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: I once thought I could also help others as a firefighting ambassador, until I saw the burning buildings and heard those wailing for help. It was then that I realized where I truly belonged: in the middle of a firestorm.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: I prefer long hair over short hair, but it's really inconvenient to have long hair while fighting fires.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: Even though there are no fire hazards here, I get to help more people. Thank you, Chief... this was what I wanted.

default.title: Idle
default.text: Uhhh... how high should I aim the hose? One sec! Let me check the manual.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Don't distract me! I need to train!

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: It's my job to teach you about fire safety! Please turn to the first page of the fire safety manual!

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Flora is all prepared and waiting to go.

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Mission accomplished. Flora has returned to the brigade!

default.title: Level Up
default.text: I've grown stronger again.

default.title: Deploy
default.text: Gear up and prepare to go!
